question_text: Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the world.
Africa is both a continent and a country.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space.
The Sahara Desert is the largest desert in the world.
Which of the following is the largest continent by area?
Which country is the largest producer of oil in the world?
Which ocean is the largest in the world?
Which mountain range is home to Mount Everest?
Which country is known as the 'Land of the Rising Sun'?
Which of the following are major rivers in Africa?
Which of the following are countries in South America?
Which of the following are considered continents?
Which of the following are the longest rivers in the world?
Which of the following countries have the largest populations in the world?
Arrange the following events in chronological order: 'The discovery of America by Christopher Columbus', 'The Industrial Revolution', 'The fall of the Roman Empire'.
words: The fall of the Roman Empire
The discovery of America by Christopher Columbus

question_text: Arrange the following countries in order of their land area from largest to smallest: 'Russia', 'United States', 'Canada'.
Arrange the following continents in order of size from largest to smallest: 'Asia', 'Africa', 'Europe'.
Arrange the following oceans in order of their size from largest to smallest: 'Pacific Ocean', 'Atlantic Ocean', 'Indian Ocean'.
Arrange the following mountains from the highest to the lowest: 'Mount Everest', 'Mount Kilimanjaro', 'Mount Fuji'.
